TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlPreloadedResolver extends System.Xml.XmlResolver

summary.span: 表示類別，用來將 DTD 或 XML 資料流預先填入快取區。

span.span: Represents a class that is used to prepopulate the cache with DTDs or XML streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路自動呼叫不需要或不可行時，將會使用為解決器的類型。The type is used as a resolver when automatic calls to the network are not desired or are not possible. 例如，此類型可以用於載入快取外部 Dtd。For example, this type can be used for loading cached external DTDs. 或者，您可以使用預先載入已知 XHTML 1.0 中所定義的 Dtd。Or, you might use to preload well-known DTDs that are defined in XHTML 1.0. 預先載入的已知的 Dtd 不會不會啟動任何網路連線，因為這些 Dtd 已內嵌 System.Xml.Utils 組件中。Preloading well-known DTDs does not start any network connections because these DTDs are already embedded in the System.Xml.Utils assembly. 目前，包含 XHTML 1.0 和 RSS 0.91 中所定義的 Dtd。Currently, includes the DTDs that are defined in XHTML 1.0 and RSS 0.91.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.

span.span: A or object that corresponds to the actual source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時會先嘗試查閱的預先載入的資料存放區中的資源。The will first try to look up the resource in its store of preloaded data. 如果找不到它，它會呼叫後援的解析程式`GetEntity`方法。If it cannot find it, it will call the fallback resolver's `GetEntity` method. 如果沒有後援的解析程式中提供建構函式擲回例外狀況。If no fallback resolver was provided in the constructor, an exception is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 無法解析 中傳遞的 URI。

span.span: Cannot resolve URI passed in .
-or- is not of a supported type.
